sentence.Network_en: A boy who had Rhett's dark handsomeness and another little girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个像瑞德那样黝黑英俊的男孩,或者再来个女孩,都行呀.

sentence.Network_en: But he became a bad boy because of his handsomeness.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是他却因为他的俊俏而变成一个坏小孩.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of having regular well-defined features (especially of a man)

auth_sentence.content: The series gleams with HBO handsomeness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The series gleams with HBO handsomeness.

auth_sentence.content: He was fifty-four, and any trace of the pinup handsomeness of his youth was gone.
